name: Quick Chicken Divan
author: Shannon Fountain
summary: My family loves this recipe. My kids love it because the broccoli is 'hidden' under all the chicken and cheese! This is an excellent way to use up leftovers.
ingredients: 2  cooked boneless chicken breast halves, chopped
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of chicken soup
1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Place broccoli in the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish
In a small bowl, blend the cream of chicken soup, cream of mushroom soup, mayonnaise, and lemon juice
Pour the mixture over the chicken
Bake 35 to 40 minutes in the preheated oven, until bubbly and lightly browned
